name: STAR SOD
description: Abducted by the mysterious STAR group, you are put to work eliminating key targets of the Space Trading Association in this short action shooter game. Will you Succeed Or Die!?
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7-4770 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980 Ti DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 5 GB available space
